import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./qualification.css"; const Qualification = () => { const [toggleState, setToggleState] = useState(1); const toggleTab = (index) => { setToggleState(index); }; return (

Qualification

My personel journey
toggleTab(1)} > Education
toggleTab(2)} > Experience

Web Design

Spain - Institute
2021 - Present

Art Director

Spain - Institute
2020 - 2021

Web Development

Spain - Institute
2018 - 2020

UX Expert

Spain - Institute
2017 - 2018

Product Designer

Microsoft - Spain
2021 - Present

UX Designer

Apple Inc - Spain
2020 - 2021

Web Designer

Figma - Spain
2018 - 2020
); }; export default Qualification;
